sentences.en: Another drop of water fell with a soft plop.
sentences.cn: 又一滴水嘀嗒一声落下。

sentences.en: Daddy called and asked me to drop by his office.
sentences.cn: 爸爸打来电话让我去他办公室一趟。

sentences.en: Does that mean you're going to drop the subject?
sentences.cn: 那是不是意味着你将不再谈论那个话题了？

sentences.en: drop me a line at the usual address.
sentences.cn: 按老地址给我寄封短信。

sentences.en: drop me a line at the usual address.
sentences.cn: 按老地址给我寄封短信。

sentences.en: Drop the dough onto a baking sheet with a teaspoon.
sentences.cn: 用茶匙把生面团舀到烤盘上。

sentences.en: Drop the slices into the oil and fry until golden brown.
sentences.cn: 将切片倒进油里，煎至金棕色。

sentences.en: Drop us a line, it's always great to hear from you.
sentences.cn: 给我们写封短信，能收到你的信总是让人很高兴。

sentences.en: he admitted he might have dropped his first managerial clanger.
sentences.cn: 他承认自己可能在管理上出了第一个岔子。

sentences.en: he dropped a brick when he admitted that he knew where we were going.
sentences.cn: 他不小心说漏了嘴，承认他知道我们要去哪儿。

sentences.en: He felt a sudden compulsion to drop the bucket and run.
sentences.cn: 他突然有一种想扔掉水桶撒腿就跑的冲动。

sentences.en: he used to be very bashful, blushing at the drop of a hat.
sentences.cn: 他曾经非常害羞，会莫名其妙地脸红。

sentences.en: he was dropping hints that in future he would be taking a back seat in politics.
sentences.cn: 他暗示将来要在政坛退居二线。

sentences.en: He was prepared to take a drop in wages.
sentences.cn: 他已做好心理准备接受降薪。

sentences.en: I let the horse drop his head to crop the spring grass.
sentences.cn: 我让马低下头啃吃春天的青草。

sentences.en: I really dropped the ball on this one.
sentences.cn: 在这件事上我的确出了错。

sentences.en: If I drop a few hints he might give me a cutting.
sentences.cn: 如果我给点暗示，他没准会送我一段插枝。

sentences.en: Might I trouble you for a drop more tea?
sentences.cn: 能否麻烦您再添一点茶？

sentences.en: Oh, drop the ‘Senator’ (= stop calling me ‘Senator’ ) – just call me Gordon.
sentences.cn: 噢，不要叫我 “参议员” ，就叫我戈登吧。

sentences.en: She dabbed a drop of the musky perfume behind each ear.
sentences.cn: 她在两耳后分别擦上一小滴麝香香水。

sentences.en: she had seen her father drop dead of a heart attack.
sentences.cn: 她曾看见她父亲因心脏病发作而猝死。

sentences.en: Some time later, the matter was quietly dropped.
sentences.cn: 过了一段时间，这件事就不了了之了。

sentences.en: Temperatures can drop to freezing at night.
sentences.cn: 晚上气温能陡降到零度以下。

sentences.en: the £550 million saving is likely to be a drop in the ocean.
sentences.cn: 节约的5.5亿英镑有可能是沧海一粟。

sentences.en: The drop in travel is bad news for the airline industry.
sentences.cn: 旅游热降温对航空业来说是个坏消息。

sentences.en: The drop was caused partly by the pound's strength against the dollar.
sentences.cn: 下降的部分原因在于英镑对美元的升值。

sentences.en: The effect is soft and pretty rather than drop-dead sexy.
sentences.cn: 给人的印象是柔和俏丽而不是吸人眼球的性感。

sentences.en: The number of deaths on the roads has dropped sharply.
sentences.cn: 交通事故死亡人数已大大减少。

sentences.en: The proposal was dropped after opposition from civil liberties groups.
sentences.cn: 遭到公民自由组织的反对后这一提案便被驳回了。

sentences.en: You can’t expect me to drop everything (= completely stop doing whatever I am doing ) whenever you’re in town.
sentences.cn: 你不能指望你一进城我就得放下手头的所有事情。

sentences.en: Your button has dropped off.
sentences.cn: 你的纽扣掉了。

words.tran_cn: 滴管；使滴下的东西；点滴器
下降，减少；掉下，滴下（drop的过去式和过去分词形式）
落下；退出（drop的ing形式）；滴入；随口漏出

phrases.phrase: a drop in the ocean (或 in a bucket)
at the drop of a hat
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)立即；莫名其妙地，一有刺激就
(英，非正式)做事出岔子，犯愚蠢的错误
不知不觉变得；顺便进入；偶然进入
[口]训斥；[口]偶然发现；[口]突然访问；使某人感到吃惊
省略单词开头的‘h’音（在英国常被认为是说话者社会阶层低下的标志）
(北美，非正式)犯错，出错，做错事

trans.tran_cn: 滴，少量，减少，糖豆，落差，空投
trans.tran_en: a very small amount of liquid that falls in a round shape

trans.tran_cn: 落下，（使）降低，使掉下，累倒，中途放下，停止，把…除名，急剧倾斜而下，给…送到，断绝往来
trans.tran_en: to fall suddenly onto the ground or into something

trans.tran_cn: 落下；下降，降低；停止，放弃
trans.tran_en: to fall suddenly onto the ground or into something
